resources.string: Gear2cam allows you to remotely control your phone\'s camera.
Now taking selfies and \'pro\' photos using a tripod is very easy.
To start, please login with Facebook on the next screen.
Can we post your photos to your Facebook? We will always ask you first!
To start, please launch the Gear2cam app on your watch.
Login above if you want to post to Facebook from your watch
Are you sure you are connected to the internet?
Ask me to post photo to Facebook after a click
This app only works with the Samsung Galaxy Gear 2 smart watch and a supported Samsung phone. Please make sure your watch is paired with this phone via the Gear Manager app.
Note: You can view your hi-res images through the Gallery app

By using this software (and clicking the "Accept" button below) you are:

 1. Agreeing to our "Do no evil" Privacy Policy and other legal matters that can be found at:
 http://www.gear2cam.com/privacy.html

 2. Acknowledging that you are above 13 years of age and that this application may be dangerous for children to use.

 3. Agreeing that you will ONLY use the application in the context of privacy laws and other laws as applicable in your country of use.

 4. Agreeing that you will ONLY use the application for personal and non-commercial use (for a commercial use license, please contact us at support@gear2cam.com).

 
 A perpetual, non-transferable, irrevocable license is hereby given to you to use this software free of charge provided the above 4 conditions are met.
